name: discode
description: A Visual Studio Code extension that displays the projects you're working in, on your Discord profile. (Yeah, I know: not new. Shut up.)

markdownEnumDescriptions: The lowest level and _most verbose_ output.
Get a deeper insight into the extension's execution.
Simple information about the extension's runtime.
Any warnings displayed by the extension that prevent proper execution.
**Recoverable** errors that result in _part_ of the extension not working correctly.
**Unrecoverable** errors that result in the extension not being able to run _at all._

discode.disableThisWorkspace.title: Hide Workspace
discode.disableThisWorkspace.markdownDescription: Doesn't show an RPC activity for this workspace.

discode.idleTimeout.title: Set Idle Timeout
discode.idleTimeout.markdownDescription: Specifies the number of seconds to wait before updating the RPC to an idle screen.

discode.includeWatermark.title: Include a Watermark
discode.includeWatermark.markdownDescription:
Whether or not to include a button that links back to this extension.

_If you opt not to have this enabled, you can share this project by word of mouth. Thank you._

discode.promptOnNewRelease.title: Prompt on New Release
discode.promptOnNewRelease.markdownDescription: Whether or not to prompt the user on startup when a new version of this extension is discovered.

discode.keepFileTimersWhenChanging.title: Keep File Timers When Changing
discode.keepFileTimersWhenChanging.markdownDescription: Do not start a new timer when changing between files.

discode.startNewTimersAfterIdling.title: Start New Timers After Idling
discode.startNewTimersAfterIdling.markdownDescription: Start a new timer when going idle on a given file.

discode.useGitFeatures.title: Use Git Features
discode.useGitFeatures.markdownDescription: Whether or not to update users about your project's GitHub repository.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
